data.message:
hi I made up this rap so please read it and give me feed back 

                         DONT GIVE UP YET ITS NOT THE END 

someday I will see you happy 
someday I will see you smile 
but right now I know it's gonna take a while 
I see them tears deep in your eyes
and to be honest it just makes me wanna cry
yeh I know your going through a rough time 
but I will tell you ending your life 
right now isn't the best thing that comes to my mind 
all this shit that brings you down
makes you self harm, 
makes you turn suicidal 
and so much more 
all of this will just make you stronger 
and laugh and smile for longer

(chorus) 
I know it's hard I see your hurt but please listen to me baby you don't have to do it on your own. so baby don't give up, baby don't give up, just promise me anything but please don't give up. I know you might be hurting, I know you think your falling but I swear to god that this pain is gonna go away

I know you think your worthless 
I know you think your bad
but in my eyes your just so fucking rad
your beautiful alright just listen to me 
stop thinking your worthless 
stop thinking your bad 
stop thinking your ugly 
because you know what love 
that's not gonna change anything 
yeh 1 cut 2 cuts 3 cuts 4 
1 pill 2 pills 3 pills 4 pills 
then before you know it theres 14 more 
look your laying on the ground 
this might be the end
but love this isn't gonna change anything 
it's just gonna make people 
upset, depressed, stressed and so much more

(chorus) 
I know it's hard I see your hurt but please listen to me baby you don't have to do it on your own. so baby don't give up, baby don't give up, just promise me anything but please don't give up. I know you might be hurting, I know you think your falling but I swear to god that this pain is gonna go away 

listen up hunny your only young 
look at the future it's gonna be hella fun 
just think for moment 
close your eyes take deep breathes 
imagine the future how it would be 
if you were just layed to rest 
your family, your friends, your peers 
they would be fucked 
counselling everyday for them 
yeh don't you think that would be fucked 
just listen to me think of the future 
you will be married, have kids, make a family 
you know this is the stuff you gotta keep in mind 
because seriously I don't wanna see you gone 
until your 109 
I promise you this isn't the end 
the end is when you die from old age and your just layed to rest
so don't give up now it's just gonna get better 
listen to these words of mine 
because I promise you this rough time now 
it will just get better 
one step at a time 
second by second 
minute by minute 
hour by hour 
day by day 
month by month 
year by year 
just listen to me baby 
it will all be fine because you know I'm here ah

replies.message: wat a fckng freakk nd awwsumm song u hv made... am going to sing it on ma farewell function... I jst fckng luv it... its damn awssum du.e... jst fckng awwsumm.... sts kinda serious inspirational lyrics.... hw did u got dat... its really fckngly greatt.. accept mah frnd request.... I seriously need a frnd like uh...
